  • Constructor Details

    • EnquiryService

      public EnquiryService()
      Constructs a new EnquiryService. Initializes the internal enquiry list.

  • Method Details

    • loadEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> loadEnquiries()
      Loads enquiry data from enquiries.csv. Validates enquiry IDs (uniqueness), dates, and required fields (text, date). Updates the static `nextId` in the Enquiry class based on loaded IDs to ensure future generated IDs are unique. Populates the internal enquiry list.
      Specified by:
      loadEnquiries in interface IEnquiryService
      Returns:
      A copy of the list containing all loaded enquiries.

    • saveEnquiries

      public void saveEnquiries(List<Enquiry> enquiriesToSave)
      Saves the provided list of enquiries to enquiries.csv. Formats enquiry data, including handling null reply fields, for CSV storage. Overwrites the existing file. Updates the internal enquiry list to match the saved state.
      Specified by:
      saveEnquiries in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      enquiriesToSave - The list of Enquiry objects to save.

    • addEnquiry

      public void addEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Adds a new enquiry to the internal list if an enquiry with the same ID doesn't already exist. Prints an error message if a duplicate ID is detected.
      Specified by:
      addEnquiry in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The Enquiry object to add.

    • removeEnquiry

      public boolean removeEnquiry(String enquiryId)
      Removes an enquiry from the internal list based on its ID.
      Specified by:
      removeEnquiry in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to remove. If null, the method does nothing.
      Returns:
      true if an enquiry with the matching ID was found and removed, false otherwise.

    • findEnquiryById

      public Enquiry findEnquiryById(String enquiryId)
      Finds an enquiry by its unique ID from the internally managed list.
      Specified by:
      findEnquiryById in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to find.
      Returns:
      The Enquiry object if found, or null if the ID is null or not found.

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(String applicantNric)
      Retrieves a list of all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant. Filters the internal enquiry list based on the applicantNric field.
      Specified by:
      getEnquiriesByApplicant in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      A list of Enquiry objects submitted by the specified applicant. Returns an empty list if NRIC is null or no enquiries are found.

    • getEnquiriesByProject

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByProject(String projectName)
      Retrieves a list of all enquiries associated with a specific project. Filters the internal enquiry list based on the projectName field.
      Specified by:
      getEnquiriesByProject in interface IEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project.
      Returns:
      A list of Enquiry objects for the specified project. Returns an empty list if projectName is null or no enquiries are found.

    • getAllEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Retrieves a copy of the list containing all enquiries currently managed by the service. Returning a copy prevents external modification of the internal state.
      Specified by:
      getAllEnquiries in interface IEnquiryService
      Returns:
      A new ArrayList containing all Enquiry objects.
